data.actual_result: Discord hard crashes and logs you out if you have your console open, otherwise it just crashes
data.short_description: Overlay either instacrashes you or if you disable it from the User Settings it hard crashes
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Overaly enabled and ON for any game - Launch that game - If you haven't crashed by now, go to your User Settings - Go to Game Activity - See your game in the green bar - Turn off the Overlay from there
